column4: I have two Ubuntu computers one the same network connected via a switch. What's the easies way to share file between them? When I right-click a folder and choose "Sharing options" it asks me to install some Windows stuff.
scp user@192.168.1.5:Documents/* .  #Will copy all documents from 192.168.1.5 to your current dir
You can also set up nfs if you like. (If you want persestant access)
